committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands
Subcommittee on Conservation, Energy, and Forestry

official_title: Commemorating 100 years of natural resource conservation achievements made possible through the vision and leadership of Representative John W. Weeks and the enactment of the Weeks Act in 1911.

summary.text: Recognizes former Representative, Senator, and Secretary of War, John W. Weeks, for his visionary conservation leadership. Encourages the Department of Agriculture (USDA) to celebrate the centennial of the enactment of the Weeks Act. Recognizes the importance of conserving and restoring U.S. forests and grasslands from new and emerging threats.

titles.title: Commemorating 100 years of natural resource conservation achievements made possible through the vision and leadership of Representative John W. Weeks and the enactment of the Weeks Act in 1911.
